# campaignToken

**Instance Property**

A token you use to represent an ad campaign and measure its effectiveness.

## Declaration

```swift
var campaignToken: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

A campaign token is a 40-byte string that represents an ad campaign. By setting the `campaignToken`, you can measure the effectiveness of an Apple Services Performance Partners Program link or an App Store Connect Analytics campaign.

For more information, see [https://apple.com/itunes/affiliates] and [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/LanguagesUtilities/Conceptual/iTunesConnect_Guide/Chapters/About.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40011225].

## Verifying Advertising Campaigns

- **providerToken**: A token that represents the provider of an app promotion campaign, and that you use to measure the campaign’s effectiveness.
- **setAdditionalValue(_:forKey:)**: Sets an additional value for a key, such as a value for measuring the effectiveness of an ad campaign.
- **additionalValue(forKey:)**: Returns the object associated with the key.
